scripts.test:mat:smoke:tests:CreateContinuousVar: NO_COLOR=1 $(npm bin)/cypress run --env configFile=test --spec 'cypress/integration/MAT/WebInterface/SmokeTests/CreateContinuousVariableMeasure.spec.js' --browser chrome --reporter json;
